title: Ticket #4147: cmd_status simplification and speedup
description:
Problems Exist in length of series of tests

There is a common perl module which sets up a couple personal condors from template files and forever jobs fired from scripts. We can do the same more simply and explicitly using StartCondorWithParams and SimpleJob.

First step was to establish connected personal condor pools utilizing CondorTest::StartCondorWithParams and not do the low level start by hand connecting all the dots the hard way. This was done and all fail on windows and only one of the command status tests is currently failing on linux.
